content.text:
# List of Padma Shri award recipients in science and engineering

This is a list of recipients of the Padma Shri award, the fourth-highest civilian award of the Republic of India, in the field of Science and Engineering. As of 2025, a total of 342 individuals have been awarded Padma Shri for their contributions to science and engineering.
